::DrillBit/KitKat2::

They both lost their balance as the base made its decent into the lava.
"What is going on? We dont need any more problems right now." Asked
KitKat2.

"I'm not sure love. Feels like the whole base is dropping. Hold on."
He opens a commlink.
"Shivah, its DrillBit. What's going on?"
